signal

Class Signal

  • java.lang.Object
    • signal.Signal
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComplexSignal, RealSignal

    public class Signal
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an abstract class to store a 3D signal in a float array 'data'. The data are store in a 2D array, the first index represents the z direction and the second store a 2D plane in row-major representation. There are two implementations of this class: RealSignal to store a real volume and ComplexSignal to store a complex signal in interleaving mode.
    Author:
    Daniel Sage
